relationships.description: Hermione caught the beetle on the windowsill in the hospital wing.
Harry observed the markings around the beetle's antennae.
Viktor pulled a beetle out of Hermione's hair.
Rita was perched on the windowsill of the Divination class.
Madame Maxime listened to Hagrid telling her about his mum.
Malfoy was talking to the beetle.
Hagrid told Madame Maxime about his mum.
